data.convo: Good morning , madam . I'd like to apply for a library card . Can you help me ? Yes . Please give me your ID card , a photo . OK . Here you are . Then you have to give me 15 dollars for the deposit . The library card is free . OK . Here is the money . And If I return the card , can I get the refund ? Of course , as long as the card is well kept . OK . I see . Thank you . You are welcome .
